name: Help Desk
description: Need assistance? Our dedicated helpdesk team is here to support you throughout the event.Visit our Help Desk at the Main Entrance - Hall 2 at the Riyadh Exhibition & Convention Center or contact us through the app for immediate assistance.
htmlDescription:
Need assistance? Our dedicated helpdesk team is here to support you throughout the event.

Visit our Help Desk at the Main Entrance - Hall 2 at the Riyadh Exhibition & Convention Center or contact us through the app for immediate assistance.

name: Veefin Solutions Limited
description: The Veefin Group of Companies is on a mission to become the Global No.1 Working Capital Technology Platform. Veefin Group addresses every aspect of optimizing Working Capital, by offering solutions across end-to-end digital Supply Chain Finance, Digital identity verification and automated financial statement analysis, debt securitization, cash management, trade finance, automated Accounts Receivable (AR) & Accounts Payable (AP) and software consulting and services by deploying innovative, agile & scalable technology.  Veefin Group also builds white-labeled Supply Chain Finance and Digital Lending solutions including end-to-end Lending Stack, Smart Credit Decisioning, Business Intelligence, Analytics and Omni-channel Onboarding for Banks, Financial Institutions, Fintechs, B2B marketplaces, and Corporates. Part of the Veefin Group of companies, Veefin Solutions Ltd. the parent Company is listed on BSE SME. Incorporated in 2020, Veefin Group is headquartered in Mumbai with offices in Ahmedabad, Dhaka, & Singapore.
htmlDescription: The Veefin Group of Companies is on a mission to become the Global No.1 Working Capital Technology Platform. Veefin Group addresses every aspect of optimizing Working Capital, by offering solutions across end-to-end digital Supply Chain Finance, Digital identity verification and automated financial statement analysis, debt securitization, cash management, trade finance, automated Accounts Receivable (AR) & Accounts Payable (AP) and software consulting and services by deploying innovative, agile & scalable technology.  Veefin Group also builds white-labeled Supply Chain Finance and Digital Lending solutions including end-to-end Lending Stack, Smart Credit Decisioning, Business Intelligence, Analytics and Omni-channel Onboarding for Banks, Financial Institutions, Fintechs, B2B marketplaces, and Corporates. Part of the Veefin Group of companies, Veefin Solutions Ltd. the parent Company is listed on BSE SME. Incorporated in 2020, Veefin Group is headquartered in Mumbai with offices in Ahmedabad, Dhaka, & Singapore.

name: Thunes
description: Thunes is the Smart Superhighway to move money around the world. Thunes’ proprietary Direct Global Network allows Members to make payments in real-time in over 130 countries and more than 80 currencies. Thunes’ Network connects directly to over 7 billion mobile wallets and bank accounts worldwide, as well as 15 billion cards via more than 320 different payment methods. Thunes’ Direct Global Network differentiates itself through its worldwide reach, in-house SmartX Treasury System and Fortress Compliance Platform, ensuring Members of the Network receive unrivaled speed, control, visibility, protection, and cost efficiencies when making real-time payments, globally.
htmlDescription:
Thunes is the Smart Superhighway to move money around the world.

Thunes’ proprietary Direct Global Network allows Members to make payments in real-time in over 130 countries and more than 80 currencies. Thunes’ Network connects directly to over 7 billion mobile wallets and bank accounts worldwide, as well as 15 billion cards via more than 320 different payment methods.


Thunes’ Direct Global Network differentiates itself through its worldwide reach, in-house SmartX Treasury System and Fortress Compliance Platform, ensuring Members of the Network receive unrivaled speed, control, visibility, protection, and cost efficiencies when making real-time payments, globally.

name: RESAL
description: Resal is the leading Saudi company in digital card solutions, rewards, and loyalty programs. We empower individuals, businesses, and merchants to maximize the benefits of digital value with a seamless and exceptional experience using innovative technologies.
htmlDescription: Resal is the leading Saudi company in digital card solutions, rewards, and loyalty programs. We empower individuals, businesses, and merchants to maximize the benefits of digital value with a seamless and exceptional experience using innovative technologies.

name: Resecurity
description: Resecurity® is a cybersecurity company that delivers a unified platform for endpoint protection, fraud prevention, risk management, and cyber threat intelligence. Known for providing best-of-breed data-driven intelligence solutions, Resecurity's services and platforms focus on early-warning identification of data breaches and comprehensive protection against cybersecurity risks. Founded in 2016, it has been globally recognized as one of the world's most innovative cybersecurity companies with the sole mission of enabling organizations to combat cyber threats regardless of how sophisticated they are. Most recently, Resecurity was named as one of the Top 10 fastest-growing private cybersecurity companies in Los Angeles, California by Inc. Magazine. An Official Partner of the Cybercrime Atlas by the World Economic Forum (WEF), Member of InfraGard National Members Alliance (INMA), AFCEA, NDIA, SIA, FS-ISAC and the American Chamber of Commerce in Saudi Arabia (AmChamKSA), Singapore (AmChamSG), Korea (AmChamKorea), Mexico (AmChamMX), Thailand (AmChamThailand), and UAE (AmChamDubai). To learn more about Resecurity, visit https://resecurity.com.
htmlDescription: Resecurity® is a cybersecurity company that delivers a unified platform for endpoint protection, fraud prevention, risk management, and cyber threat intelligence. Known for providing best-of-breed data-driven intelligence solutions, Resecurity's services and platforms focus on early-warning identification of data breaches and comprehensive protection against cybersecurity risks. Most recently, Resecurity was named as one of the Top 10 fastest-growing private cybersecurity companies in Los Angeles, California by Inc. Magazine. name: Enjaz payment service
description: ​At Enjaz Payment Services, we provide our customers with convenient and secure ways to transfer funds internationally.Recognizing the need for speed in today's fast-paced world, Enjaz Payment Services have been optimized for quick and efficient fund transfers. This ensures that customers can complete their desired transactions promptly, which is particularly advantageous for urgent financial needs.

name: MIS PAY
description: MISpay is a leading Saudi fintech company reimagining how people shop and pay — starting with Buy Now, Pay Later solutions tailored for the Saudi market.We empower millions of users and thousands of merchants — from large enterprises to growing businesses — with flexible payment options that drive customer satisfaction and business growth. Our network includes over 1,000 iconic partners such as Adidas, Calvin Klein, Skechers, Crocs, Beverly Hills Polo Club, 6th Street, R&B, Abdul Samad Al Qurashi، Almajed for Oud، Almanea، Tamkeen، and many more.From Riyadh to every corner of the Kingdom, MISpay is shaping the future of commerce — one easy payment at a time.
htmlDescription:
MISpay is a leading Saudi fintech company reimagining how people shop and pay — starting with Buy Now, Pay Later solutions tailored for the Saudi market.

We empower millions of users and thousands of merchants — from large enterprises to growing businesses — with flexible payment options that drive customer satisfaction and business growth. Our network includes over 1,000 iconic partners such as Adidas, Calvin Klein, Skechers, Crocs, Beverly Hills Polo Club, 6th Street, R&B, Abdul Samad Al Qurashi، Almajed for Oud، Almanea، Tamkeen، and many more.

From Riyadh to every corner of the Kingdom, MISpay is shaping the future of commerce — one easy payment at a time.

name: Ejada Systems Company
description: ejada Systems is a transformation orchestrator — building intelligent, integrated environments that connect strategy, platforms, and operations into a responsive, value-driven ecosystem. Headquartered in Riyadh, Saudi Arabia, ejada enables government entities, large enterprises, and private sector organizations to thrive in a rapidly evolving digital landscape through comprehensive digital transformation and IT Solutions.With over two decades of experience, ejada has established itself as a leader in the Kingdom’s digital journey. Our offerings span a wide spectrum of services, including enterprise application development, data and AI solutions, cloud Solutions, cybersecurity, customer experience, pre-built solutions, Emerging Technology, and IT consulting.Strategic PositioningAs a key contributor to Saudi Arabia’s Vision 2030, ejada plays a pivotal role in modernizing the Kingdom’s national digital infrastructure. Its team of over 4,000 professionals combines deep insight into local market needs with advanced technical expertise to deliver flexible, scalable, and strategically valuable digital solutions.Business LinesEnterprise Applications: comprehensive suite of enterprise application solutions designed to streamline operations, reduce operational costs, enhance productivity and visibilityData and Analytics: data and analytics solutions designed to help businesses and governments harness the power of data, gain actionable insights, informed strategic decisions, improve operational efficiency and drive growth.Cybersecurity: comprehensive suite of cybersecurity solutions that go beyond the traditional and leverage cutting-edge technologies.Cloud Solutions: full spectrum of cloud solutions, from consultancy and discovery to management, SaaS, migration (lift and shift or modernization), multi-cloud, and hybrid cloud solutions.Mobility and Customer Experience: ejada's proven expertise in customer experience (CX), mobility, portals, CRM, and DXP positions us as an ideal partner for organizations seeking to navigate the evolving Saudi and regional CX landscape.Infrastructure, ITOps & Observability: From core infrastructure management and real-time monitoring to site reliability engineering and cloud operations.Pre-built solutions: ejada's pre-built, industry-specific, and business-process-oriented solutions are readily available for deployment.Emerging Technology: comprehensive suite of both ready-to-use and tailored solutions designed to integrate seamlessly into your business.
htmlDescription:
ejada Systems is a transformation orchestrator — building intelligent, integrated environments that connect strategy, platforms, and operations into a responsive, value-driven ecosystem. Headquartered in Riyadh, Saudi Arabia, ejada enables government entities, large enterprises, and private sector organizations to thrive in a rapidly evolving digital landscape through comprehensive digital transformation and IT Solutions.

With over two decades of experience, ejada has established itself as a leader in the Kingdom’s digital journey. Our offerings span a wide spectrum of services, including enterprise application development, data and AI solutions, cloud Solutions, cybersecurity, customer experience, pre-built solutions, Emerging Technology, and IT consulting.

Strategic Positioning

As a key contributor to Saudi Arabia’s Vision 2030, ejada plays a pivotal role in modernizing the Kingdom’s national digital infrastructure. Its team of over 4,000 professionals combines deep insight into local market needs with advanced technical expertise to deliver flexible, scalable, and strategically valuable digital solutions.

Business Lines

  • Enterprise Applications: comprehensive suite of enterprise application solutions designed to streamline operations, reduce operational costs, enhance productivity and visibility
  • Data and Analytics: data and analytics solutions designed to help businesses and governments harness the power of data, gain actionable insights, informed strategic decisions, improve operational efficiency and drive growth.
  • Cybersecurity: comprehensive suite of cybersecurity solutions that go beyond the traditional and leverage cutting-edge technologies.
  • Cloud Solutions: full spectrum of cloud solutions, from consultancy and discovery to management, SaaS, migration (lift and shift or modernization), multi-cloud, and hybrid cloud solutions.
  • Mobility and Customer Experience: ejada's proven expertise in customer experience (CX), mobility, portals, CRM, and DXP positions us as an ideal partner for organizations seeking to navigate the evolving Saudi and regional CX landscape.
  • Infrastructure, ITOps & Observability: From core infrastructure management and real-time monitoring to site reliability engineering and cloud operations.
  • Pre-built solutions: ejada's pre-built, industry-specific, and business-process-oriented solutions are readily available for deployment.
  • Emerging Technology: comprehensive suite of both ready-to-use and tailored solutions designed to integrate seamlessly into your business.

name: RIZE
description: Rize is a startup company that provides: Rent now, pay later, a service that converts annual lease payments from a single full payment to 12 monthly installments for the tenant. At the same time, the property owner gets the full annual rent upfront.Funding via CrunchbaseSeries AUS$ 35.2M
htmlDescription:
Rize is a startup company that provides: Rent now, pay later, a service that converts annual lease payments from a single full payment to 12 monthly installments for the tenant. At the same time, the property owner gets the full annual rent upfront.

Funding via Crunchbase
Series A
US$ 35.2M

name: Kearney
description: Since 1926, Kearney has been a leading management consulting firm and trusted partner to three-quarters of the Fortune Global 500 and governments around the world. With a presence across more than 40 countries, our people make us who we are. We work impact first, tackling your toughest challenges with original thinking and a commitment to making change happen together. By your side, we deliver—value, results, impact.

name: NAMI LUNA SPACE FINANCIAL
description: A leading fintech specializing in payment solutions. We provide merchants with solutions to optimize and streamline payment operations. We proudly enabled +87,959 merchants and have +144K payment terminals in the market. We won the IFM award for "Most Innovative POS Solutions Provider."

name: AL Raedah Finance
description: Small and Medium Enterprises (SMEs) are the largest contributors to job creation, having a direct impact on local communities, as well as being a gateway for economic innovation. As part of the Kingdom’s ambitious plans that form Vision 2030, the Saudi government has launched multiple programs to encourage SME development, with a target set for 2030 to have SME contribution to the Kingdom’s GDP reach 35% (equating to SAR 2.1 trillion).As an underserved market, SMEs face multiple challenges when scaling their businesses or growing their operations. This is where Alraedah plays an integral role in supporting SMEs to achieve long term and sustainable growth, by offering innovative financial products and services that anticipate and proactively address market needs while eliminating existing pain points.Since its establishment in 2016 Alraedah has become the principal financing institution for SMEs in the Kingdom of Saudi Arabia. Our success is built on our simple and transparent process, our in-depth understanding of the local market, and our flexible financing solutions.As Alraedah is licensed by the Central Bank of Saudi Arabia (SAMA) and offers the most extensive coverage for Sharia’h compliant financing solutions within the Kingdom. With ambitious digital expansion plans, an expanding workforce of expert financial advisors, and an unwavering commitment to service excellence, Alraedah will remain a pioneering champion of SMEs in the Kingdom.
htmlDescription:
Small and Medium Enterprises (SMEs) are the largest contributors to job creation, having a direct impact on local communities, as well as being a gateway for economic innovation. As part of the Kingdom’s ambitious plans that form Vision 2030, the Saudi government has launched multiple programs to encourage SME development, with a target set for 2030 to have SME contribution to the Kingdom’s GDP reach 35% (equating to SAR 2.1 trillion).


As an underserved market, SMEs face multiple challenges when scaling their businesses or growing their operations. This is where Alraedah plays an integral role in supporting SMEs to achieve long term and sustainable growth, by offering innovative financial products and services that anticipate and proactively address market needs while eliminating existing pain points.

Since its establishment in 2016 Alraedah has become the principal financing institution for SMEs in the Kingdom of Saudi Arabia. Our success is built on our simple and transparent process, our in-depth understanding of the local market, and our flexible financing solutions.

As Alraedah is licensed by the Central Bank of Saudi Arabia (SAMA) and offers the most extensive coverage for Sharia’h compliant financing solutions within the Kingdom. With ambitious digital expansion plans, an expanding workforce of expert financial advisors, and an unwavering commitment to service excellence, Alraedah will remain a pioneering champion of SMEs in the Kingdom.

name: elm
description: We have redefined the digital landscape in Saudi Arabia by creating smart solutions that enable government entities, individuals, and private sector companies to advance forward towards a future abundant in opportunities, where the welfare of communities is attained, and our local and global footprint is established.
htmlDescription: We have redefined the digital landscape in Saudi Arabia by creating smart solutions that enable government entities, individuals, and private sector companies to advance forward towards a future abundant in opportunities, where the welfare of communities is attained, and our local and global footprint is established.

name: BARQ
description: Barq is Saudi Arabia’s fastest-growing digital wallet, redefining the way people experience money. Launched just one year ago, Barq has already become the only wallet you’ll ever need. Serving over 7 million users across 150+ nationalities, with more than 500 million transactions processed and 73 billion SAR moved.In just 21 days, Barq reached its first 1 million users, setting a new benchmark locally and internationally. Today, it has issued over 6.5 million Visa cards, empowering communities with seamless, secure, and gamified financial services.More than just a wallet, Barq champions financial inclusion by creating solutions for the unbanked, offering accounts for kids, and embedding a marketplace within its platform. By blending innovation with accessibility, Barq is transforming finance into something simpler, smarter, and more engaging. Growing every day to meet the needs of the future. Barq is limitless ambition!
htmlDescription:
Barq is Saudi Arabia’s fastest-growing digital wallet, redefining the way people experience money. Launched just one year ago, Barq has already become the only wallet you’ll ever need. Serving over 7 million users across 150+ nationalities, with more than 500 million transactions processed and 73 billion SAR moved.

In just 21 days, Barq reached its first 1 million users, setting a new benchmark locally and internationally. Today, it has issued over 6.5 million Visa cards, empowering communities with seamless, secure, and gamified financial services.

More than just a wallet, Barq champions financial inclusion by creating solutions for the unbanked, offering accounts for kids, and embedding a marketplace within its platform. By blending innovation with accessibility, Barq is transforming finance into something simpler, smarter, and more engaging. Growing every day to meet the needs of the future. Barq is limitless ambition!

name: Dinar Investment
description: Dinar is one of the region’s first to unify multiple Islamic investment and financing tools into a digital platform, enabling efficient fundraising and investor access, with strong compliance and operational excellence.
htmlDescription: Dinar is one of the region’s first to unify multiple Islamic investment and financing tools into a digital platform, enabling efficient fundraising and investor access, with strong compliance and operational excellence.

name: OneCard
description: Founded in 2004 in Riyadh, Saudi Arabia, OneCard is the first and leading company in the MENA region to specialize in digital gift cards. OneCard has a broad distribution network including Banks, Fintech's & Retailers, providing them with online gaming, entertainment, and mobile top-up gift cards from both local and global providers.
htmlDescription: Founded in 2004 in Riyadh, Saudi Arabia, OneCard is the first and leading company in the MENA region to specialize in digital gift cards. OneCard has a broad distribution network including Banks, Fintech's & Retailers, providing them with online gaming, entertainment, and mobile top-up gift cards from both local and global providers.

name: Hyperpay Inc Saudi Information Systems Technology
description: HyperPay is a leading payment gateway in the MENA region committed to continuously enriching innovative payment solutions and payment processing products and services to cope with the rapid change in market demands.HyperPay brings everything required to support different business needs in diverse industries of all sizes along with accepting almost all payment methods and local payment brands and acquirer banks within the MENA region.
htmlDescription:
HyperPay is a leading payment gateway in the MENA region committed to continuously enriching innovative payment solutions and payment processing products and services to cope with the rapid change in market demands.
HyperPay brings everything required to support different business needs in diverse industries of all sizes along with accepting almost all payment methods and local payment brands and acquirer banks within the MENA region.

name: Al Yusr Leasing and Financing
description: The awards received by Al Yusr Leasing and Financing Company represent its commitment to excellence in the financial sector, particularly in providing innovative and Shariah-compliant financing solutions.
htmlDescription: The awards received by Al Yusr Leasing and Financing Company represent its commitment to excellence in the financial sector, particularly in providing innovative and Shariah-compliant financing solutions.

name: The Lending Hub
description: The Lending Hub is a leading peer-to-peer crowdfunding platform that aims to provide underbanked borrowers with quick access to alternative funding options. We have created an online marketplace that connects these borrowers with a diverse crowd of lenders who are looking to diversify their investment portfolios by investing in small-ticket loans. Through our innovative platform, we facilitate the efficient and transparent exchange of funds, creating a win-win situation for both borrowers and lenders.
htmlDescription: The Lending Hub is a leading peer-to-peer crowdfunding platform that aims to provide underbanked borrowers with quick access to alternative funding options. We have created an online marketplace that connects these borrowers with a diverse crowd of lenders who are looking to diversify their investment portfolios by investing in small-ticket loans. Through our innovative platform, we facilitate the efficient and transparent exchange of funds, creating a win-win situation for both borrowers and lenders.

name: Singleview
description: SingleView – Revolutionizing Open Banking for CorporatesSingleView is a cutting-edge open banking platform designed to streamline corporate financial management by providing a unified, real-time view of accounts across multiple banks. With a strong commitment to innovation, security, and efficiency, SingleView empowers businesses to optimize cash flow, enhance financial decision-making, and simplify complex banking operations.Claim to FameSingleView stands out as a pioneering fintech solution that bridges the gap between corporates and banks, offering seamless integrations, advanced payment processing, and enhanced financial insights. Our platform is trusted by leading enterprises for its robust security measures, intuitive user experience, and compliance with the latest open banking regulations.Key AchievementsRecognized as a top fintech innovator in corporate open banking solutions.Successfully integrated with multiple banks across the region, providing businesses with a seamless banking experience.Helped corporations save time and reduce operational costs by automating financial workflows.Launched a secure and user-friendly dashboard, making financial management more accessible and efficient.Fun FactsSingleView was born out of a vision to simplify corporate banking complexities and provide CFOs with a single, reliable source of financial truth.The platform is designed to support businesses of all sizes, from startups to large enterprises.SingleView’s team includes fintech experts, banking veterans, and tech enthusiasts, all working together to reshape the future of corporate finance.With SingleView, businesses gain control, clarity, and confidence in their financial operations, making open banking work for them, not against them.
htmlDescription:
SingleView – Revolutionizing Open Banking for Corporates

SingleView is a cutting-edge open banking platform designed to streamline corporate financial management by providing a unified, real-time view of accounts across multiple banks. With a strong commitment to innovation, security, and efficiency, SingleView empowers businesses to optimize cash flow, enhance financial decision-making, and simplify complex banking operations.

Claim to Fame
SingleView stands out as a pioneering fintech solution that bridges the gap between corporates and banks, offering seamless integrations, advanced payment processing, and enhanced financial insights. Our platform is trusted by leading enterprises for its robust security measures, intuitive user experience, and compliance with the latest open banking regulations.

Key Achievements
Recognized as a top fintech innovator in corporate open banking solutions.
Successfully integrated with multiple banks across the region, providing businesses with a seamless banking experience.
Helped corporations save time and reduce operational costs by automating financial workflows.
Launched a secure and user-friendly dashboard, making financial management more accessible and efficient.
Fun Facts
SingleView was born out of a vision to simplify corporate banking complexities and provide CFOs with a single, reliable source of financial truth.
The platform is designed to support businesses of all sizes, from startups to large enterprises.
SingleView’s team includes fintech experts, banking veterans, and tech enthusiasts, all working together to reshape the future of corporate finance.
With SingleView, businesses gain control, clarity, and confidence in their financial operations, making open banking work for them, not against them.

name: Qsalary
description: Qsalary is Saudi Arabia’s leading Earned Wage Access (EWA) platform, reshaping the way employees and employers experience payroll. By providing secure, Shariah-compliant access to earned wages anytime during the month, Qsalary empowers employees with financial flexibility and peace of mind — while helping employers strengthen retention, productivity, and workplace satisfaction.With over 50,000 employees across 100+ companies already enrolled, Qsalary is driving financial inclusion at scale. Our platform integrates seamlessly with HR and payroll systems, ensuring a smooth and compliant experience for both employers and employees.
htmlDescription:
Qsalary is Saudi Arabia’s leading Earned Wage Access (EWA) platform, reshaping the way employees and employers experience payroll. By providing secure, Shariah-compliant access to earned wages anytime during the month, Qsalary empowers employees with financial flexibility and peace of mind — while helping employers strengthen retention, productivity, and workplace satisfaction.


With over 50,000 employees across 100+ companies already enrolled, Qsalary is driving financial inclusion at scale. Our platform integrates seamlessly with HR and payroll systems, ensuring a smooth and compliant experience for both employers and employees.

name: Aseel Capital
description: At Aseel, we are a licensed fintech company authorized by the Capital Market Authority. We specialize in crowdfunding for investment and real estate funds, providing financial returns that align with the objectives of both investors and developers.We are dedicated to offering various public and private investment opportunities within the Kingdom, all while ensuring full compliance with the regulatory framework set by the Authority. This commitment allows our clients to exercise their rights as unit holders by managing the entire investment process online.
htmlDescription:
At Aseel, we are a licensed fintech company authorized by the Capital Market Authority. We specialize in crowdfunding for investment and real estate funds, providing financial returns that align with the objectives of both investors and developers.

We are dedicated to offering various public and private investment opportunities within the Kingdom, all while ensuring full compliance with the regulatory framework set by the Authority. This commitment allows our clients to exercise their rights as unit holders by managing the entire investment process online.

name: WOSUL
description: WOSUL A Saudi platform that provides the requirements for managing your business on one cloud. Dedicated to the retail sector.WOSUL system works to enable the cloud cashier with professional integrated system for the points of sale, to become a model process that prepares solutions and tools suitable for the needs of the projects, and to enable the merchant and reach customers in a rapid manner, and to increase the indicator of sales volume growth towards the specified goal.

name: Tarmeez Capital
WALAA
description: Walaa is one of the leading insurance and reinsurance companies in Saudi Arabia. Established in Al-Khobar with a paid-up capital of SAR 1.27 billion, Walaa has been committed since its establishment to providing innovative and comprehensive insurance solutions that meet the needs of both individuals and businesses. The company has achieved remarkable growth over the years, expanding its range of services to cover various aspects of life. This expansion and innovation have helped establish Walaa as a trusted partner in the Saudi market, reflecting its commitment to providing the best insurance solutions for its clients. Walaa is also dedicated to supporting the community through its various initiatives, enhancing its position as a leading and responsible company.
htmlDescription:
Walaa is one of the leading insurance and reinsurance companies in Saudi Arabia. Established in Al-Khobar with a paid-up capital of SAR 1.27 billion, Walaa has been committed since its establishment to providing innovative and comprehensive insurance solutions that meet the needs of both individuals and businesses. 

The company has achieved remarkable growth over the years, expanding its range of services to cover various aspects of life. This expansion and innovation have helped establish Walaa as a trusted partner in the Saudi market, reflecting its commitment to providing the best insurance solutions for its clients. Walaa is also dedicated to supporting the community through its various initiatives, enhancing its position as a leading and responsible company.

name: SiFi
description:
SiFi is a corporate expense management platform that gives finance and accounting teams complete control and visibility over company spending.

With SiFi, businesses can issue corporate cards with built-in spending limits, ensuring every transaction is authorized and aligned with company policies. Our platform also streamlines vendor payments, making it easier to manage all expenses in one place—securely and efficiently.
htmlDescription:
SiFi is a corporate expense management platform that gives finance and accounting teams complete control and visibility over company spending.

With SiFi, businesses can issue corporate cards with built-in spending limits, ensuring every transaction is authorized and aligned with company policies. Our platform also streamlines vendor payments, making it easier to manage all expenses in one place—securely and efficiently.

name: Tamweel Aloula
description:
نفخر بكوننا إحدى أوائل شركات التمويل في المملكة ونطمح لأن نكون الخيار الأول لعملائنا دائما. و نسعى في شركة تمويل الأولى إلى توفير تجربة رقمية متميزة تُسهل عملية الحصول على الحلول التمويلية من أي مكان وفي أي وقت. كما نؤمن بأهمية توفير حلول تمويلية تلبي كافة احتياجات المجتمع ولذلك نسعى دائما للمرونة وتسهيل شروط طلب التمويل دون الحاجة إلى كفيل او زيارة الفرع. 
 
تمويل الأولى شركة مساهمة مغلقة مرخصة و خاضعة لإشراف ورقابة البنك المركزي السعودي.

name: Adria Business & Technology
description: ADRIA B&T is a leading provider of innovative digital banking solutions, with a strong presence across Africa, Europe, and the Middle East. We offer a comprehensive suite of solutions designed to help financial institutions modernize their digital infrastructure while delivering enhanced customer engagement. Our offerings include Digital Onboarding with Ekyc, Mobile and Web Banking, Open Banking, Digital Lending, Digital Corporate Banking, E-Wallet, Digital Signing & Sealing, Agency Banking, and Trade Finance. At ADRIA B&T, our mission is to empower financial institutions to lead in the digital age. We offer scalable, secure, and forward-looking platforms that drive customer engagement and optimize operational efficiency. Our platform is built to ensure seamless customer interactions across multiple touchpoints, maintaining high standards of data security and regulatory compliance.
htmlDescription:
ADRIA B&T is a leading provider of innovative digital banking solutions, with a strong presence across Africa, Europe, and the Middle East. We offer a

comprehensive suite of solutions designed to help financial institutions modernize their digital infrastructure while delivering enhanced customer engagement. Our offerings include Digital Onboarding with Ekyc, Mobile and Web Banking, Open Banking, Digital Lending, Digital Corporate Banking, E-Wallet, Digital Signing & Sealing, Agency Banking, and Trade Finance.

At ADRIA B&T, our mission is to empower financial institutions to lead in the digital age. We offer scalable, secure, and forward-looking platforms that drive customer engagement and optimize operational efficiency. Our platform is built to ensure seamless customer interactions across multiple touchpoints, maintaining high standards of data security and regulatory compliance.

name: Ant International
description: With headquarters in Singapore and main operations across Asia, Europe, the Middle East and Latin America, Ant International is a leading global digital payment, digitisation and financial technology provider. Through collaboration across the private and public sectors, our unified techfin platform supports financial institutions and merchants of all sizes to achieve inclusive growth through a comprehensive range of cutting-edge digital payment and financial services solutions.

Through collaboration across the private and public sectors, our unified techfin platform supports financial institutions and merchants of all sizes to achieve inclusive growth through a comprehensive range of cutting-edge digital payment and financial services solutions.

name: Tap Payments
description: Since 2014, we've led the MENA region in digital payments, with over a decade of experience serving over 100,000 businesses of all sizes.We offer tailored payment products, are licensed and regulated by local authorities, and have offices in 9 countries.We offer all the local, regional & global payment methods your customers love, whether that's mada, KNET, Fawry, Apple Pay, Visa, Mastercard, Amex, Tabby, and many more. Tap is connected to 200 banks across MENA so that you can be paid out to the bank account of your choice.
htmlDescription:
Since 2014, we've led the MENA region in digital payments, with over a decade of experience serving over 100,000 businesses of all sizes.

We offer tailored payment products, are licensed and regulated by local authorities, and have offices in 9 countries.

We offer all the local, regional & global payment methods your customers love, whether that's mada, KNET, Fawry, Apple Pay, Visa, Mastercard, Amex, Tabby, and many more.

name: MAMBU LTD
description: Mambu is the world’s only true SaaS cloud banking platform. Launched in 2011, Mambu fast-tracks the design and build of nearly any type of financial offering for banks of all sizes, lenders, fintechs, retailers, telcos and more. Our unique composable approach means that independent components, systems and connectors can be assembled in any configuration to meet business needs and end user demands. Mambu supports over 260 customers in over 65 countries - including Western Union, Commonwealth Bank of Australia, N26, BancoEstado, Raiffeisen Bank, ABN AMRO and Bank Islam.

name: Tamara
description: Tamara is the leading Saudi financial super app, built for today’s world to reshape how people in the region pay and live.As the Kingdom’s first fintech unicorn, Tamara is reshaping how millions of users across Saudi Arabia, the UAE, and Bahrain manage their financial lives. It offers flexible payments, innovative tools, and seamless experiences designed for everyday living.Backed by Sanabil Investments (PIF), SNB Capital, Checkout.com, and other top global investors, Tamara is proudly building the future of finance from the region for the region, helping people “Own their dream and pay their way.”

Backed by Sanabil Investments (PIF), SNB Capital, Checkout.com, and other top global investors, Tamara is proudly building the future of finance from the region for the region, helping people “Own their dream and pay their way.”

name: Saudi Credit Bureau Simah
description: SIMAH stands for the Saudi Credit Bureau and is the first and sole licensed national credit bureau in Saudi Arabia, responsible for collecting, exchanging, and managing credit information for individuals and businesses. It provides credit reports and scores to help lenders assess risk and enables consumers and companies to monitor and improve their credit health. SIMAH's data is used to form a comprehensive financial database, contributing to a stable financial infrastructure in the Kingdom, all under the supervision of the Saudi Central Bank (SAMA)
htmlDescription: SIMAH stands for the Saudi Credit Bureau and is the first and sole licensed national credit bureau in Saudi Arabia, responsible for collecting, exchanging, and managing credit information for individuals and businesses. It provides credit reports and scores to help lenders assess risk and enables consumers and companies to monitor and improve their credit health. SIMAH's data is used to form a comprehensive financial database, contributing to a stable financial infrastructure in the Kingdom, all under the supervision of the Saudi Central Bank (SAMA)

name: Lean Technologies
description: Lean Technologies is the leading financial infrastructure provider in the MENA region, enabling businesses to access financial data and initiate payments through a single, secure platform. Lean supports over 300 companies and has processed more than $2 billion in transaction volume across more than 1 million connected accounts. By powering the seamless integration of personalized financial services, from payments and data to account verification, Lean helps businesses deliver better experiences to their users. The company is committed to making financial infrastructure more accessible, transparent, and impactful, driving a more connected and inclusive financial ecosystem.

name: Backbase BV
description: The future of banking starts nowWith two decades of innovation behind us — and a bold vision ahead — we’re helping the world’s leading banks seize their future. It’s time for banking leadership to get back to what they do best: driving growth, creating value, and shaping the future of finance. We call it “Growth Mode.”We give banks what they’ve been asking for all along: the freedom to grow, the tools to lead, and the ability to turn every customer into a fan.Let’s reimagine. Let’s build. Let’s grow.

The future of banking starts now

With two decades of innovation behind us — and a bold vision ahead — we’re helping the world’s leading banks seize their future. It’s time for banking leadership to get back to what they do best: driving growth, creating value, and shaping the future of finance. We call it “Growth Mode.”
We give banks what they’ve been asking for all along: the freedom to grow, the tools to lead, and the ability to turn every customer into a fan.

Let’s reimagine. Let’s build. Let’s grow.

name: Masdr
description: Masdr is a company owned by the General Organization for Social Insurance (GOSI), aiming to enhance well-being through a range of products and services offered to individuals, government entities, and private organizations. Among the many domains where Masdr drives impact, the financial sector stands out as a key area of enablement. Through our advanced data solutions—ranging from real-time income and employment insights to proprietary risk scores—we support organizations across the industry in making smarter, faster decisions. Our tools help verify information instantly, reduce operational risk, and unlock access to underserved segments, all while enabling seamless and secure customer experiences.

name: Tuum
description: Tuum is the core banking platform for a world of banking without limits.Built for institutions ready to modernize, scale, and lead, Tuum helps banks, lenders and fintechs escape the constraints of legacy technology and accelerate into a new era of agility, innovation, and growth.Cloud-native and modular by design, Tuum supports all key financial business models — from lending and payments to BaaS and Islamic banking — on a single, extensible platform. Clients can modernize progressively, launch products in weeks, and expand into new markets without sacrificing control, compliance, or performance.With enterprise-grade scalability, real-time processing, and an open API architecture, Tuum delivers the flexibility to adapt fast — while significantly lowering total cost of ownership and shifting budgets toward innovation.Tuum is trusted by leading financial institutions across the globe to build the future of banking — one without limits.Tuum. Banking without limits.
htmlDescription:
Tuum is the core banking platform for a world of banking without limits.

Built for institutions ready to modernize, scale, and lead, Tuum helps banks, lenders and fintechs escape the constraints of legacy technology and accelerate into a new era of agility, innovation, and growth.

Cloud-native and modular by design, Tuum supports all key financial business models — from lending and payments to BaaS and Islamic banking — on a single, extensible platform. Clients can modernize progressively, launch products in weeks, and expand into new markets without sacrificing control, compliance, or performance.

With enterprise-grade scalability, real-time processing, and an open API architecture, Tuum delivers the flexibility to adapt fast — while significantly lowering total cost of ownership and shifting budgets toward innovation.

Tuum is trusted by leading financial institutions across the globe to build the future of banking — one without limits.

Tuum. Banking without limits.

name: Foodics
description: Foodics Group is the leading restaurant and payment tech company in MENA, with an innovative 360° SaaS ecosystem making it a pioneer in the regional F&B industry. Formally licensed as a Fintech company by the Saudi Central Bank (SAMA), the company’s vision is to build a complete restaurant management ecosystem that enables owners to run their operations seamlessly and grow their business. Its mission is to empower restaurant and merchant owners with a comprehensive cloud-based POS system to enrich their operations. Foodics caters to every segment of the F&B sector from traditional dine-in restaurants, cafés, quick service restaurants, bakeries, food trucks through to cloud kitchens and non-food micro-retailers. Since its inception in 2014, it has successfully processed over 6 billion orders through the platform and raised a record USD 170m in Series C round, making it one of the most promising SaaS companies to emerge from the MENA region.
htmlDescription: Foodics Group is the leading restaurant and payment tech company in MENA, with an innovative 360° SaaS ecosystem making it a pioneer in the regional F&B industry. Formally licensed as a Fintech company by the Saudi Central Bank (SAMA), the company’s vision is to build a complete restaurant management ecosystem that enables owners to run their operations seamlessly and grow their business. Its mission is to empower restaurant and merchant owners with a comprehensive cloud-based POS system to enrich their operations. Foodics caters to every segment of the F&B sector from traditional dine-in restaurants, cafés, quick service restaurants, bakeries, food trucks through to cloud kitchens and non-food micro-retailers. Since its inception in 2014, it has successfully processed over 6 billion orders through the platform and raised a record USD 170m in Series C round, making it one of the most promising SaaS companies to emerge from the MENA region.

name: ALMAMOON INSURANCE BROKER CO
description: Almamoon Insurance Broker is a trusted insurance intermediary in Saudi Arabia, specializing in providing comprehensive insurance solutions for businesses. Partnering with leading insurance providers, Almamoon offers various coverage options, including property, liability, and employee benefits insurance. With a focus on understanding the unique needs of each business, Almamoon ensures that companies receive customized, cost-effective insurance solutions to protect their assets and operations. Heath Lambert was our joint venture partner operating in Saudi Arabia in 2001. After Almamoon's management acquired their license in Saudi Arabia, we established our brokerage, Almamoon Broker, in 2005, further strengthening our commitment to delivering reliable insurance services tailored to the local market.
htmlDescription:

name: Fuse Finance
description: Fuse is on a mission to bring real-time cross-border payments to the Middle East and Asia, helping global businesses access both regions without changing their payment stack. We believe these markets present some of the most exciting payment opportunities in the world today—historically fragmented and underserved, yet among the fastest growing. Fuse is building the local infrastructure needed to keep up, offering virtual accounts in both Middle Eastern and Asian currencies to enable seamless payouts and collections. To date, we've raised over $8.6mn to help us radically change how money moves in and out of these regions, backed by top investors including Northzone, Flourish, Raba, and Alter Global. With our head office in Dubai, we're trusted by payment companies and enterprise businesses worldwide to move money locally—powering payouts to contractors on Deel, hosts on Airbnb, sellers on Etsy, and many more. And this is just the beginning.
htmlDescription: Fuse is on a mission to bring real-time cross-border payments to the Middle East and Asia, helping global businesses access both regions without changing their payment stack. We believe these markets present some of the most exciting payment opportunities in the world today—historically fragmented and underserved, yet among the fastest growing. Fuse is building the local infrastructure needed to keep up, offering virtual accounts in both Middle Eastern and Asian currencies to enable seamless payouts and collections. To date, we've raised over $8.6mn to help us radically change how money moves in and out of these regions, backed by top investors including Northzone, Flourish, Raba, and Alter Global. With our head office in Dubai, we're trusted by payment companies and enterprise businesses worldwide to move money locally—powering payouts to contractors on Deel, hosts on Airbnb, sellers on Etsy, and many more. And this is just the beginning.

name: Qualyn
Dyna.Ai

Our expertise encompasses state-of-the-art AI models, sophisticated algorithms, AI-human interaction technologies, and big data analytics. htmlDescription:
Dyna.Ai is a leading AI-as-a-Service company headquartered in Singapore, dedicated to transforming the finance industry and beyond with cutting-edge AI-driven products and solutions.

Our expertise encompasses state-of-the-art AI models, sophisticated algorithms, AI-human interaction technologies, and big data analytics. Slogan: AI Revolutionize Finance

name: Moneymoon
description: Moneymoon is the first peer-to-peer (P2P) lending app in Saudi Arabia, offering a one-month, salary-tied loan model that connects individual borrowers and lenders directly—without intermediaries or paperwork.Borrowers can request small, short-term loans—typically between SAR 1,000 and SAR 5,000—repaid in a single installment upon their next salary. With no long-term debt, no paperwork, and no friction, the process is entirely digital and remarkably fast. From request to disbursement, funds are typically received in minutes—showcasing a user experience built for today’s pace of life.Lenders, meanwhile, gain access to a new asset class of short-duration lending. With transparent borrower scoring (A, B, C, D) and one-month maturity, Moneymoon offers clarity, liquidity, and control. Auto-Lend allows lenders to reinvest automatically based on risk preferences, further simplifying portfolio management.Licensed under the Saudi Central Bank’s Regulatory Sandbox in 2024, Moneymoon has seen viral adoption across the Kingdom—driven by the platform’s simplicity, ethical structure, and intuitive user experience.Moneymoon is personal finance, reimagined.
htmlDescription:
Moneymoon is the first peer-to-peer (P2P) lending app in Saudi Arabia, offering a one-month, salary-tied loan model that connects individual borrowers and lenders directly—without intermediaries or paperwork.

Borrowers can request small, short-term loans—typically between SAR 1,000 and SAR 5,000—repaid in a single installment upon their next salary. With no long-term debt, no paperwork, and no friction, the process is entirely digital and remarkably fast. From request to disbursement, funds are typically received in minutes—showcasing a user experience built for today’s pace of life.
Lenders, meanwhile, gain access to a new asset class of short-duration lending. With transparent borrower scoring (A, B, C, D) and one-month maturity, Moneymoon offers clarity, liquidity, and control. Auto-Lend allows lenders to reinvest automatically based on risk preferences, further simplifying portfolio management.

Licensed under the Saudi Central Bank’s Regulatory Sandbox in 2024, Moneymoon has seen viral adoption across the Kingdom—driven by the platform’s simplicity, ethical structure, and intuitive user experience.

Moneymoon is personal finance, reimagined.

name: ShokranPay Inc.
description: Shokran was founded in 2023 as the first Islamic payment system for SMEs in Canada, holding a licensed MSB status and pioneering Sharia‑compliant business banking. By late 2024, the team had grown to over 50 professionals, secured a Money Broker and Payment Service Operator license in Labuan, and expanded globally. With more than 100 clients and handling over $10 million in monthly transactions, Shokran is rapidly transitioning into a full-fledged Islamic Neobank. Our platform is built on ethical finance, seamless cross‑border transfers, multi‑currency accounts, and instant onboarding - especially designed for fast‑growing SMEs and digital entrepreneurs across MENA and Southeast Asia.
htmlDescription: Shokran was founded in 2023 as the first Islamic payment system for SMEs in Canada, holding a licensed MSB status and pioneering Sharia‑compliant business banking. By late 2024, the team had grown to over 50 professionals, secured a Money Broker and Payment Service Operator license in Labuan, and expanded globally. With more than 100 clients and handling over $10 million in monthly transactions, Shokran is rapidly transitioning into a full-fledged Islamic Neobank. Our platform is built on ethical finance, seamless cross‑border transfers, multi‑currency accounts, and instant onboarding - especially designed for fast‑growing SMEs and digital entrepreneurs across MENA and Southeast Asia.

name: BUPA ARABIA FOR COOPERATIVE INS
description: Bupa Arabia is a leading health insurance provider in Saudi Arabia, dedicated to delivering comprehensive healthcare services tailored to individuals, families, and businesses. Established in 1997, it is part of the global Bupa Group, a multinational healthcare organization headquartered in the UK. Bupa Arabia listed on the Saudi Stock Exchange (Tadawul) and operates under a mission to ensure healthier, longer, and happier lives for its members.In 2024 Bupa Arabia established its provision business arm “Bupa CareConnect” to enhance healthcare accessibility through innovative services and programs.We believe in our principle, which is to help people enjoy and maintain better health for life. We work every day to maintain our position as a leading global healthcare company.
htmlDescription:
Bupa Arabia is a leading health insurance provider in Saudi Arabia, dedicated to delivering comprehensive healthcare services tailored to individuals, families, and businesses. Established in 1997, it is part of the global Bupa Group, a multinational healthcare organization headquartered in the UK. Bupa Arabia listed on the Saudi Stock Exchange (Tadawul) and operates under a mission to ensure healthier, longer, and happier lives for its members.
In 2024 Bupa Arabia established its provision business arm “Bupa CareConnect” to enhance healthcare accessibility through innovative services and programs.
We believe in our principle, which is to help people enjoy and maintain better health for life. We work every day to maintain our position as a leading global healthcare company.

name: BSF GROUP
description: BSF, a Joint Stock Company established by Royal Decree No. M/23 dated June 1977, is one of the leading banks in Saudi Arabia. It has its head office in Riyadh and regional offices in Jeddah, Al-Riyadh and Al-Khobar. Through its 85 branches/self-service centers, 520 ATMs and over 28,000 points of sale, BSF is committed to providing innovative and excellent services to its clients. BSF offers a wide range of financial services in Corporate Banking and Retail Banking. The Bank also provides investment banking, asset management and investment funds services, in addition to brokerage services through BSF Capital.   BSF’s main focus is to provide a new standard in customer experience that stands out for its simplicity and transparency further empowering its customers while offering them personalized advice. BSF's business model is customer-oriented, with the goal of being a leader in customer satisfaction on a national and regional levels.

name: Dal alilm Commercial
description: Dal is a Technology and Advisory firm established by former CMA regulators and capital market professionals. Dal's mission is to enable the Saudi capital market, offering a one-stop solution for the needs of capital market institutions (CMIs) through it's advisory and technology offerings. Dal's flagship RegTech & AML platform, Ayn is designed specifically for the needs of CMIs, allowing them to manage sanctions, peps, adverse media, and Nafith & Makken in one single platform automatically; while Dal's advisory arm handles all the needs of CMIs from financial institution set up, GRC, internal audit, all the way to IPO. Join Dal and #Move_Confidently.
htmlDescription:
Dal is a Technology and Advisory firm established by former CMA regulators and capital market professionals. Dal's mission is to enable the Saudi capital market, offering a one-stop solution for the needs of capital market institutions (CMIs) through it's advisory and technology offerings. Dal's flagship RegTech & AML platform, Ayn is designed specifically for the needs of CMIs, allowing them to manage sanctions, peps, adverse media, and Nafith & Makken in one single platform automatically; while Dal's advisory arm handles all the needs of CMIs from financial institution set up, GRC, internal audit, all the way to IPO.


Join Dal and #Move_Confidently.

name: MOZN
description: Mozn is an Enterprise AI company. We help organizations make informed decisions through specialized AI platforms, in two key areas:1- Financial crime prevention and2- Enterprise GenAIUnlike generic AI solutions, our technologies are shaped by the language, culture, and regulations of every market we serve - ensuring our clients get solutions that are relevant and precise.---What do we offer?FOCAL: An intelligent platform for financial crime prevention that centralizes fraud detection and prevention, AML monitoring, and customer due diligence into one seamless solution.OSOS: An enterprise GenAI platform that enables organizations to extract insights and make informed decisions based on diverse sources of data, including documents and databases.
htmlDescription:
Mozn is an Enterprise AI company. We help organizations make informed decisions through specialized AI platforms, in two key areas:

1- Financial crime prevention and

2- Enterprise GenAI

Unlike generic AI solutions, our technologies are shaped by the language, culture, and regulations of every market we serve - ensuring our clients get solutions that are relevant and precise.

---What do we offer?

FOCAL: An intelligent platform for financial crime prevention that centralizes fraud detection and prevention, AML monitoring, and customer due diligence into one seamless solution.

OSOS: An enterprise GenAI platform that enables organizations to extract insights and make informed decisions based on diverse sources of data, including documents and databases.

name: Tiqmo
description: A digital wallet licensed by the Saudi Central Bank, delivering seamless, fast, and convenient financial solutions.
htmlDescription: A digital wallet licensed by the Saudi Central Bank, delivering seamless, fast, and convenient financial solutions.

name: Capital Market Authority
description: The Capital Market Authority (CMA) is the financial regulatory authority for Saudi Arabia’s capital markets. The CMA’s functions are to regulate and develop the Saudi Capital Market by issuing required rules and regulations for implementing the provisions of Capital Market Law. The basic objectives are to create an appropriate investment environment, boost confidence, and reinforce transparency and disclosure standards in all listed companies, and moreover to protect the investors and dealers from illegal acts in the market
htmlDescription: The Capital Market Authority (CMA) is the financial regulatory authority for Saudi Arabia’s capital markets. The CMA’s functions are to regulate and develop the Saudi Capital Market by issuing required rules and regulations for implementing the provisions of Capital Market Law. The basic objectives are to create an appropriate investment environment, boost confidence, and reinforce transparency and disclosure standards in all listed companies, and moreover to protect the investors and dealers from illegal acts in the market

name: Tabby Financing Company JSC
description: Tabby is the shopping and financial services app that helps millions to stay in control of their spending and make the most out of their money. With Tabby, shoppers can split their purchases into interest-free payments online and in-store at over 40,000 global brands and small businesses. It was last valued at $3.3 billion in its Series E round in February 2025—making it the largest fintech in the Middle East.
htmlDescription: Tabby is the shopping and financial services app that helps millions to stay in control of their spending and make the most out of their money. With Tabby, shoppers can split their purchases into interest-free payments online and in-store at over 40,000 global brands and small businesses. It was last valued at $3.3 billion in its Series E round in February 2025—making it the largest fintech in the Middle East.

name: MoneyHash
description: MoneyHash is the first & the leading Payment Orchestration platform in the Middle East & Africa. We unify and optimize payment operations through one API, helping businesses scale, cut costs, and boost revenue across emerging markets — connecting businesses, fintechs, and banks through an open, effortless infrastructure.
htmlDescription: MoneyHash is the first & the leading Payment Orchestration platform in the Middle East & Africa. We unify and optimize payment operations through one API, helping businesses scale, cut costs, and boost revenue across emerging markets — connecting businesses, fintechs, and banks through an open, effortless infrastructure.

name: XONO
description: XONO – Web3 Financial OS for Regulated Digital AssetsXONO is a next-generation financial infrastructure provider enabling banks, fintechs, ecommerce and gaming platforms to launch and scale compliant digital asset products — including wallets, crypto and stablecoin payments, tokenized services and embedded finance.Built with banking-grade architecture and a modular design, XONO integrates seamlessly into existing legacy systems. It supports both own-license and direct licensing models, with regulatory approvals in progress across the EU, UK, and US.XONO is proven at scale — powering over 2.5 million wallets, a high-load system capable of processing up to 10 million transactions daily, serving more than 10 millions customers. Currently used across crypto, finance, gaming and payroll sectors. XONO partnered with world boxing champion Oleksandr Usyk's Ready to Pay project to launch a virtual crypto card in Telegram — making digital finance more accessible and borderless.Learn more about XONO capabilities on the company website https://xono.finance/.
htmlDescription:
XONO – Web3 Financial OS for Regulated Digital Assets

XONO is a next-generation financial infrastructure provider enabling banks, fintechs, ecommerce and gaming platforms to launch and scale compliant digital asset products — including wallets, crypto and stablecoin payments, tokenized services and embedded finance.

Built with banking-grade architecture and a modular design, XONO integrates seamlessly into existing legacy systems. It supports both own-license and direct licensing models, with regulatory approvals in progress across the EU, UK, and US.

XONO is proven at scale — powering over 2.5 million wallets, a high-load system capable of processing up to 10 million transactions daily, serving more than 10 millions customers. Currently used across crypto, finance, gaming and payroll sectors. XONO partnered with world boxing champion Oleksandr Usyk's Ready to Pay project to launch a virtual crypto card in Telegram — making digital finance more accessible and borderless.

Learn more about XONO capabilities on the company website https://xono.finance/.

name: Khazna
description: Khazna is a pioneering financial Super App dedicated to delivering accessible, technology-driven financial solutions to underserved communities. In Saudi Arabia, Khazna offers the Salary Advance service, aiming to bring formal financial services to those who need them most and to modernize cash transactions.Aligned with Saudi Arabia’s Vision 2030 and the Financial Sector Development Program (FSDP), including the Fintech Strategy, Khazna plays a vital role in promoting financial inclusion and positioning the Kingdom as a global fintech leader by expanding financial access and fostering innovative digital solutions nationwide.Our leadership team combines decades of experience across technology, banking, and finance.
htmlDescription:
Khazna is a pioneering financial Super App dedicated to delivering accessible, technology-driven financial solutions to underserved communities. In Saudi Arabia, Khazna offers the Salary Advance service, aiming to bring formal financial services to those who need them most and to modernize cash transactions.

Aligned with Saudi Arabia’s Vision 2030 and the Financial Sector Development Program (FSDP), including the Fintech Strategy, Khazna plays a vital role in promoting financial inclusion and positioning the Kingdom as a global fintech leader by expanding financial access and fostering innovative digital solutions nationwide.

Our leadership team combines decades of experience across technology, banking, and finance.

name: iPiD
description: iPiD provides a single global API for real-time payee validation, reducing fraud and ensuring seamless payments across borders. It covers all types of accounts in about 50 countries.
htmlDescription: iPiD provides a single global API for real-time payee validation, reducing fraud and ensuring seamless payments across borders. It covers all types of accounts in about 50 countries.

name: Comfi
description: Comfi is a fintech startup born in Dubai, built to solve one of the most pressing challenges facing SMEs across the MENA region: cash flow delays. In a region where payment terms often stretch to 60–90 days, many small and medium-sized businesses struggle to grow or even survive while waiting to get paid. That’s where we come in.Comfi empowers SMEs with instant access to working capital through two core products: Buy Now, Pay Later (BNPL) for B2B and Invoice Discounting. We pay suppliers and service providers upfront, and their buyers or debtors pay us back later - in 30, 60, or 90 days. This means SMEs get paid immediately, avoid cash flow gaps, and can reinvest in growth without waiting months for receivables.Unlike traditional banks, Comfi moves fast;  approvals within hours, minimal paperwork, and no collateral required. We’re more flexible, more accessible, and designed with SMEs in mind.Today, Comfi is a team of 40 people across the globe, serving the MENA region’s SME backbone. Whether it’s unlocking delayed receivables or enabling growth through flexible payment terms, we’re on a mission to help businesses grow faster and smarter.
htmlDescription:
Comfi is a fintech startup born in Dubai, built to solve one of the most pressing challenges facing SMEs across the MENA region: cash flow delays. In a region where payment terms often stretch to 60–90 days, many small and medium-sized businesses struggle to grow or even survive while waiting to get paid. That’s where we come in.

Comfi empowers SMEs with instant access to working capital through two core products: Buy Now, Pay Later (BNPL) for B2B and Invoice Discounting. We pay suppliers and service providers upfront, and their buyers or debtors pay us back later - in 30, 60, or 90 days. This means SMEs get paid immediately, avoid cash flow gaps, and can reinvest in growth without waiting months for receivables.

Unlike traditional banks, Comfi moves fast; approvals within hours, minimal paperwork, and no collateral required. We’re more flexible, more accessible, and designed with SMEs in mind.

Today, Comfi is a team of 40 people across the globe, serving the MENA region’s SME backbone. Whether it’s unlocking delayed receivables or enabling growth through flexible payment terms, we’re on a mission to help businesses grow faster and smarter.

name: SOLVENT GLOBAL
description: Billions of insights, one clear picture
